item.title: The Anger of an Exhausted Iraqi Youth Against a 16-year Old Corruptible Political System
item.author: Mariam Shwea,
item.description: Thousands of Iraqi youngsters, from central and southern cities and from all religious groups, have been taking the streets since October 1st against the worsening economic conditions, the divisive government policies, and widespread corruption that afflicts Iraq. The government has reacted â€¦
